entries.sourceEnglish: Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: EPISODE ONE
THE PROTEST
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
The scene fades up from black to see Old Ass giving a lecture to Trusty Ass.
entries.sourceEnglish: ...  ...  Trusty Ass? Comrade, are you listening?
Now where was I...  Right...  I was lamenting the struggles of our existence.
Despite thousands of years of service to Humans, our Herd has lost our work.
We have been reduced to spectators, while wretched Machines do OUR jobs in OUR beloved fields.
No longer will we suffer these INJUSTICES!
It is high time the Humans remember how useful we've always been.
To return to us the recognition and respect we deserve!
Tomorrow we will make history with our very first PROTEST.
Now young Comrade, good group morale is instrumental to a Protest.
Use your skills and go check in with the Herd.

entries.context:
End of dialogue. 
Trusty is assigned the task of raising the Herd's morale.
Sturdy can run around and explore again.
entries.sourceEnglish: Come find me when you're done.
Come back after you've talked to everyone!
Hi Comrade Trusty.
I pray the Gods will make sure my Foal is born with the Soul of a strong worker.
I can't bear to think about them growing up in a world cut off from our Herd's traditions.
But you're right.
If we follow Old Ass, we can restore balance to the Farm.
Asses and Humans will work together again, without a Machine in sight!

entries.context:
End of dialogue. 
Sturdy can run around and explore again.
entries.sourceEnglish: We can do it!
We can do it!

entries.context:
Dialogue with Old Ass.
After having talked to all the Asses in the Herd (completing the Morale task).
entries.sourceEnglish: Exemplary work, Comrade Trusty. Keeping up a group's morale is no easy task.
Tomorrow, our waiting will come to an end and we will restore our Herd to its rightful purpose.
Now hit the hay, Comrade.

entries.context:
End of dialogue. 
Sturdy can run around and explore again.
entries.sourceEnglish: A well earned rest awaits you in the other room.
I said hit the hay in the other room! One cannot protest short on sleep.

entries.context:
Dialogue with Sturdy.
After completing the Morale task.
entries.sourceEnglish: Goodnight Trusty! You really care about the Herd and it shows.
*Oof!* Looks like my Foal wishes they could join the Protest tomorrow too.

entries.context:
End of dialogue. 
Sturdy can run around and explore again.
entries.sourceEnglish: Even my labour pains are in solidarity with the Herd!
Goodnight!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Butte Industry Coal Mines
364 DAYS SINCE LAST MINING ACCIDENT
Welcome to Fannyside Farm. To the west, our beautiful Heritage Stable and wheat fields.
To the south, our state of the art Mill and Granary.
NEW Government Sponsored Highway: Connecting Urban and Rural Communities
The Long Way to the Forest Shrine
CLOSED FOR REPAIRS
The State of the Art Mill and Granary
The Outhouse
The Heritage Stable
Ya'fur's Well
Ahh!
It's just a scarecrow.
It's the Farmer's house...
The Truck-Machine is gone. The Humans must be in the Village.
It's the Tractor-Machine...
A rusty bucket...
This here empty trough is a damn sorry sight, Comrade.
It's been mighty dry these days...
Hell, everything from work to water's just gone and dried up!
Can you fetch me some water with that ol' bucket, from that ol' river up there?
This ol' bucket ain't gonna fill itself!
Yeehaw! Use that bucket to get some water from that there river.
Git that tasty water in the trough, Comrade!
Yeehaw! I don't know what we'd do without you, Trusty.
To be honest, I'd have gon' done it myself, but I wanna be right here when Nice Ass takes a break from her plowin'.
Ever since she got laid off, and replaced by that dang Tractor-Machine, it's like she's forgotten all about me.
We never get to have casual sex anymore.
What's the point in being castrated if you can't have casual sex!
It's a pile of wood...
Trusty! I'm so p-pleased to see you!

entries.context:
Note: In English, Slow Ass stutters happen on the same letters throughout the game: b, p

For some languages, a wider range or more case-by-case approach is used
entries.sourceEnglish: Thanks for convincing Old Ass to p-p-put me on b-bridge duty.
I think you're the only one who b-believes in me.
I have a b-bit of a p-problem though.
I've run out of wood and need more to finish fixing the b-bridge b-before the P-Protest.
If Smart Ass finds out I'm b-behind schedule,  she'll tear me a new one.
Can you b-bring me some more wood p-please?
Our p-panniers from the old days should still b-be in the Mill.
I'm p-pretty sure the old p-panniers are still in the Mill.
You found the p-panniers! The wood I need is at the end of the road to the west.
Thanks Trusty. I don't know what I'd do without you.
P-Please don't tell Smart Ass I'm b-behind schedule!
Good afternoon, Comrade.
I'm fuelling up so that I can make tomorrow's Protest a huge success.

entries.context: PB: It's not exactly clear why the donkeys are not eating, but we can assume it is that they are perhaps fasting in honour of Lazy's death.
entries.sourceEnglish: Though, I feel guilty eating all this hay when the Miners are in Mourning.
It must be pretty bad down in the Mines if it can stop an Ass from eating.
Glad I don't fit down there.
*munch munch munch*
Hiya Comrade! Haha I'm just too excited about tomorrow!
And there's nothing like a good plow to settle the nerves. Come on and do a line!
Let's plow again!

entries.context: Nice says this if the player is busy completing Slow's Wood quest and unable to plow
entries.sourceEnglish: Those panniers look great on you!
I'd totally invite you to plow with me, but you'll have to come back when you're not so busy.
At ease, Comrade Trusty.
We Miners have decided to join Old Ass's Protest.
Nothing we do tomorrow will send Comrade Lazy's Soul to the Astral Plane.
But, we owe it to her to abolish the Machines that killed her and to get our jobs back.
We'll stick to the plan and meet the Herd at the bridge.
Give my best to Sad Ass.
Trusty! I have a new one!
Why did Slow Ass cross the road?
We don't know, he's still trying to get to the other side!
Ha!
Oh shut it, can't two Jennets joke around?
I've spent all day going over the plans for the Protest:
ONE, we run through the gate.
TWO, we meet up with the Miners and cross the bridge.
THREE, we march through the Village of Bumpkin, convince the Humans to give up their Machines.
AND GET OUR JOBS BACK!
Easy.
Even a Foal could pull this off.
Oh hullo Trusty...  thanks for noticing me...
Wish I could say 'good' afternoon...  but it's not...
You probably forgot, but today's the anniversary of the tragic cave-in...
The love of my life was crushed in the Mines one year ago...
And now her Soul is stuck down there forever...
I still see Lazy Ass's beautiful dark grey eyes in my dreams...
*whimper*
I'm holding a Vigil in her memory...
Bad Ass gave me this candle...
Could you bring me some matches for my candle...?
Did you find the matches? They might be in the Stable...
Thanks for the matches...  hope I don't burn myself...
*whimper*

entries.context: After having spoken to Hard Ass, if the player speaks to Sad again
entries.sourceEnglish: Condolences from Hard Ass...?
Sometimes I wish he hadn't switched shifts with Lazy Ass that day...
*whimper*
Protest? Fuck that.
Don't get me wrong, I support addressing the systemic issues pertaining to the Ass species.
But you can't just demand your fucking jobs back.
It's technological PROGRESS, stupid.
What's the brilliant plan?
Gallop around the Village? Bray loudly? Hope for change?
Pathetic.
There's no going back to how things used to be.
Technologies and Machines are transforming the social order.
You need more than political protest—you need philosophical transformation.
Your concept of value and self-worth cannot and should not be defined by backward Humans from Bumpkin Village.
There's gotta be another way out of this ridiculous situation...
Now leave me alone.
I said ALONE.

entries.context: After finishing the Slow's wood quest, Grandma and Joey appear at the fence
entries.sourceEnglish: Grandmother! Can I feed the cute donkey?
Of course! Offer it some oats.
Here donkey!
Eat the oats.
Refuse the oats.
He he he! That tickles.

entries.context: If the player refuses to eat oats
entries.sourceEnglish: Why won't it do what I want?
Donkeys aren't very smart, honey. Come on, let's go home.
Want more, donkey?
Eat the oats.
Refuse the oats.
Want more, donkey?
Eat the oats.
Refuse the oats.
Come along, darling. This donkey seems greedy.

entries.context: Night dialogues, after the Morale quest is complete and the player returns outside to find the donkeys all sleeping
entries.sourceEnglish: ... zzz... zzz...
I'm usually up for a little extra night plowing, but we should get some rest before tomorrow's Protest.
The Truck-Machine is back...
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: A pair of panniers...
The noisy Mill-Machine...
Bags of fresh flour...
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Nice Ass and Trusty are at the starting line.
entries.sourceEnglish: Plowing's the easiest thing in the world, isn't it?
You know what to do!
Gosh! You're amazing Trusty!
Heck, we could totally team up and show that nasty Tractor-Machine a thing or two!
We gotta stay in peak shape for when things go back to normal!
So, want to do another line?
Yippee!
That Tractor-Machine has nothing on you!
Again?
Don't worry. I believe in you. Let's try again!
So close, Comrade!
Again?
Plow again!
I've got other things to do.
YOUR PLOW
BEST PLOW
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Trusty's dream is interrupted by a voice.
entries.sourceEnglish: Trusty Ass! Wake up! WAKE UP!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Matches...
Go to sleep.
Not yet, there's still more to do.
Comrade Trusty, wait!
Before you sleep, could you help me with something?
I'm struggling to come up with a name for my Foal.
If I give birth tonight, I'm worried I won't have one.
What should I name them?
NAME STURDY'S FOAL
[name]

entries.context: English includes space before the word
entries.sourceEnglish: ASS
Good thinking, but that name is taken!
Two in a row! That name is taken too!
Taken! You might need to get creative.
Not available! How about... 'Baby' Ass?
Try a different name!
{$NewName}! That's a wonderful name!
Thanks Comrade. Goodnight!

entries.context: Trusty wakes up to find Old Ass dying
entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade!
The Humans... they came to get me in the night.
Put me in their wretched Truck-Machine...
They gave me the Needle!
But they underestimated this old Ass.
And I... I...
I don't feel so good. Everything's getting cold...
... I wish I could lead the Protest today, Trusty.
I wish I could see the faces of the Humans when they wake up to us chanting ASS POWER!
Never again will they forget how useful we Asses are!
Please young Comrade, you have to play my role now!
Gather the Herd! Lead the Protest! Maintain the Morale!
SHOW THE WORLD THE POWER OF THE ASS!
Comrade...
Trusty? Are you there?
... I'm scared.
OLD ASS! NOOO!!
HEEEHAAAAAAAAAAAAW!!!
Our fearless Old Ass...
He taught us everything we know.
How could the Gods let this happen? What are we going to do without him...?!
And the Protest! It's supposed to start any moment now...
Trusty. I know I said earlier that WE can do it, but...
I can't leave Old Ass's body alone.
Someone has to sing the Song of Ascension to make sure his Ass Soul can reach the Astral Plane and be reassigned.
I'll stay with him. You lead the Herd, Comrade.
Go. Rally the others.
Hurry, Trusty!
Oh Old Ass...
Not a day goes by that I don't think of Lazy Ass, the beautiful child we lost.
I know the Gods didn't give her a Worker’s Spirit, but she was our child.
The Foal inside me won't replace Lazy Ass.
But maybe it'll be able to live the life we dreamed of...
A life free of evil, soulless, job-taking, child-killing Machines.
May you pass on in power to the Astral Plane, my dear Comrade.
"{color=yellow}{s=5}♪  hee haw hi hon 'ee ah he a'w ♪{/s}{/color}"
"{color=yellow}♪  HEE HAW HI HON 'EE AH HE A'W! ♪{/color}"
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Trusty enters the Farm House and finds the radio playing an interiew with Mme. Derriere.
entries.sourceEnglish: *ksh* Welcome back listeners to Mecha in the Morning!
We're here with Mecha City's most philanthropic and generous employer Mme. Derriere.
Tell us... what is the secret to your success?
Good morning! It's simple... success in business is all about the bottom line.
One must embrace the hustle and bustle, but also have a product that changes lives.
Stop listening
Keep listening
*ksh* My wife uses your products every morning, and I gotta say I like it too.
We're over the moon! My glutes have never felt so smooth.
I'm brimming with vitality and stamina.

entries.context: Note: try to make a pun within the flavour :)
entries.sourceEnglish: And it comes in three flavours! My favourite is the Polar Mint.
Yes that's our bestseller! I believe that EVERYONE can use this product and reap the benefits.
We feed it to our dog, and our children too!
Stop listening
Keep listening
And now it's time for the weather update...
It's a scorcher! It's looking dry as a bone out there in the Greater Fannyside Region as the drought continues.
If you need a place to take the kids, get your butts to the Mecha City Zoo, or see the new show at the Big City Circus!
Stop listening
Keep listening
Hey Trusty!
What's going on in there?! You didn't forget about the Protest, did you?!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: These seats are all facing one direction.
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Butte Industry Coal Mines
364 DAYS SINCE LAST MINING ACCIDENT
Welcome to Fannyside Farm. To the west, our beautiful Heritage Stable and wheat fields.
To the south, our state of the art Mill and Granary.
NEW Derriere Highway: Connecting Urban and Rural Communities
The Long Way to the Forest Shrine
CLOSED FOR REPAIRS
The State of the Art Mill and Granary
The Outhouse
The Heritage Stable
Ya'fur's Well
Ahh!
It's just a scarecrow.
It's the Tractor-Machine...
Hiya Comrade! I'm ready to go!
Wait, really? But Old Ass has been here forever!
Gosh, the Humans wouldn't do that, would they?
Assure Nice Ass that the Humans must have made a mistake.
Tell Nice Ass that the Humans have been corrupted by the Machines.
You're right Trusty! Accidents happen all the time!
Yikes!
Poor Old Ass.
What a massive loss. Will the Protest continue?
Emphasize to Big Ass that he has a huge part to play in the movement.
Point out to Big Ass that a good leader is dispensable.
Don't say that, Trusty. What would we do without you?
Well then I'm hungry to get started!
It's a damn sour swallow, but yer right. We can't let Old Ass's death be in vain.
Inform Thirsty Ass that Old Ass wants the Herd to continue the Protest.
Promise Thirsty Ass that Nice Ass will be there.
*gulp*
...but I don't see Nice Ass nowhere...?
YEEEHAAWWW I'M IN!
Whaa? Old Ass is dead!? And YOU'RE in charge?
No offence Trusty, but you're a listener not a leader!
Admit to Smart Ass the Herd is lucky to have such an Ace Strategist.
Confide in Smart Ass that you really need her support right now.
You could have at least admitted how lucky you are to have such an Ace Strategist.
Ha! You're damn right.
Not Old Ass... I’m sorry Trusty. Things have gone from bad to worse...
I think you should postpone the Protest...
I wouldn't go if I were you...
Politely suggest that Sad Ass should suck it up.
Commiserate with Sad Ass over all that has been lost.
*whimper*
*whimper*
Fuck no.
Get out of my face.

entries.context: After recruiting Nice, Big, Thirsty, Smart
entries.sourceEnglish: That's everyone. Now to the gate!
They need to be reminded of how darn useful our labour truly is!
They've been takin' away our livelihood, and giving us the ding dang Needle!
Asses have always been the backbone of this Farm since time immemorial.
The weight of history is on our shoulders...
Here's the Plan!
ONE, we run through this gate.
TWO, we cross the bridge with the Miners.
THREE, we march through the Village, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...
AND GET OUR JOBS BACK!
Easy.
Trusty?
What were Old Ass's last words? Perhaps they will inspire us!
Old Ass died saying: "I'm scared."
Old Ass died saying: "Show the world the power of the Ass!"
Thanks Trusty, that's exactly what we needed to hear!
Spoken like a true Ass. YEEHAW!
A grand idea.
That's catchy.
Dang.
What an empty feeling...
Yikes!
Old Ass died saying: "I'm scared."
Sheesh...
Old Ass died saying: "Show the world the power of the Ass!"
But the Humans have belittled us.
Let's break through this gate and cross the bridge!
Sorry Comrades. I've been doing my b-best.
I stayed up all night b-but haven't finished fixing the b-bridge yet.
DAMN! The Protest is ruined!
Shut up and calm down.
No offence Slow Ass, but I knew this would happen when Old Ass put you on bridge duty.
So I made a Plan B:
*p-phew*
ONE, we take the LONG way around to the NORTH.
TWO, we meet up with the Miners and enter the Village from the EAST.
THREE, we march through the Village, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...
AND GET OUR JOBS BACK!
Easy.
The long way? Okay... b-but I won't b-be able to move as fast as everyone else due to my p-painful arthritis...
B-but I p-promise I'll do my b-b-best!

entries.context: Recruit Kick Ass and Sick Ass
entries.sourceEnglish: You must be TRUSTY!
I'm KICK ASS and this is my Sister SICK ASS!
*COUGH*
What happened to meeting AT THE BRIDGE?!
Wait—where's OLD ASS?!
They gave him the ding dang Needle!
@#$%&! That makes me SO ANGRY!
*COUGH*
LET'S PROTEST!
Old Ass got the Needle?
I know how difficult it is to watch a Comrade die, even if they will one day be reborn.
We Miners have a saying:
"You only hit rock bottom when you quit."
Let's go.

entries.context: Said if the player tries to go ahead before recruiting everyone
entries.sourceEnglish: Old Ass wouldn’t want us to leave anyone behind.
Old Ass wouldn’t want us to leave anyone behind.
Old Ass wouldn’t want us to leave anyone behind.
Old Ass wouldn’t want us to leave anyone behind.

entries.context: Protest Chant based on whether Trusty tells the truth of Old's last words or lies
entries.sourceEnglish: The Herd's Morale is low, now is the time to SAY something...
REMEMBER OLD ASS'S PARTING WORDS:
SHOW THE WORLD THE POWER OF THE ASS!
WHEN I SAY ASS, YOU SAY POWER!
ASS!
POWER!
ASS!
POWER!
Let me hear you say... DON'T BE SCARED!
DON'T BE SCARED!
Trusty Ass? Where are you going? The Village isn't that way.

entries.utterer: SAY.Dialog: This is a Revolution!.3.The Masses
entries.context: The Herd arrives at the Village
entries.sourceEnglish: THIS IS A PROTEST!

entries.utterer: SAY.Dialog: This is a Revolution!.5.The Masses
entries.sourceEnglish: RESPECT OUR HISTORY!

entries.utterer: SAY.Dialog: This is a Revolution!.1.The Masses
entries.sourceEnglish: RESPECT ASS CULTURE!

entries.utterer: SAY.Dialog: This is a Revolution!.6.The Masses
entries.sourceEnglish: GIVE US OUR JOBS BACK!
Trusty Ass! Where are you going?

entries.context: They realize the village is on fire and the Humans are burning alive
entries.sourceEnglish: Gosh, did the Protest start without us?!
That smell, those screams—who did this?
This wasn't the Plan! We're here to get work, not burn the employers!
I used to work 'round here in the ol' days! There's a WELL nearby!
YEEHAW! I can taste it! Let's git some water and put out these dang fires!
C'mon, git CRACKIN'!
Thirsty thinks it'd be easier to get water from the Well.
Thirsty thinks it'd be easier to get water from the Well!
Come on everyone, put out the fire with the Well water!
Aw shucks. There's no dang water in the damn Well!
{vpunch=100,0.75}UH OH!
How are we gonna rescue the Humans?
@#$%&! What do we DO?!
*COUGH COUGH*
P-please everyone! Trusty will know what to do!
Right Trusty?
Be transparent and admit to the Masses that you don't know what to do.
Rise to the occasion, open your mouth, and deliver a stirring speech.
Solemnly assume the Traditional Ass Posture that has inspired Herds for generations.
I've analyzed the situation and—
In the beginning there was Ass. Now there is...
Ahem—

entries.context: Trusty falls into the well and dies
entries.sourceEnglish: Whoops!
{s}{s=5}COMRADE!!! {/s}
Standard

entries.context: 3D Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adip iscing elit. Sed tempus metus nec neque ullam corper pulvinar. Pellen tesque dignissim, sapien eget pretium euismod qu.
Dialogue with the Asses on the Astral Plane.
entries.sourceEnglish: Hello Newbie!
We're here to help with your welcome ritual.
Which one of us will you choose?
Spicy Ass
Happy Ass
Dirty Ass
Hairy Ass
Ugly Ass
**** Ass

entries.context: After the player has chosen their partner for the welcome ritual.
entries.sourceEnglish: Great choice, Newbie.

entries.context: End of dialogue and into the sex rhythm game.
entries.sourceEnglish: Follow your instincts and feel the love!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: PLEASURE:
CHAIN
